snippet: Most people haven't heard of matkot, but many call it Israel's unofficial national sport. Does it keep Israelis fit? Or just contribute to noise pollution at the beach?
abstract: Most people haven't heard of matkot, but many call it Israel's unofficial national sport. Does it keep Israelis fit? Or just contribute to noise pollution at the beach?

headline.main: In Israel, Paddleball as Fitness Regime
